moves.35. Ra1 Qe4: Later, mozart 28 said, "In the previous game, I felt that you should have won the game. I thought your mistake was at move 35 when I had to offer the Queen swap. I thought you had a superior position if you had taken my Queen then. But hey, hind sight is always 20/20!"
